articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys May Day Joint Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys May Day Joint Concert
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a joint concert by the Unhasu Orchestra of the DPRK and the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia on Saturday, May Day.
					 The concert began with the playing of the national anthems of the DPRK and Russia. Put on the stage were chorus "May, the  Month of Victory", female chorus "Song of Industrial Construction of Country", chorus and orchestra "March of 'Aida'", female solo and chorus "Three Thousand-ri of Vinalon", female duet "Wishes", mixed duet "Oh, Pyongyang", female solo "Are We Living Like in Those Days?" male solo "Officers", female trio "Here Is My Country Where I live", orchestra and chorus "Fantastic Serial Wartime Songs of Russia", female quartet "This Is Icon of Socialism", orchestra "Chollima Gallops forward", mixed chorus "Where Are You, Dear General", and other famous songs loved by the peoples of the two countries and world famous songs and mixed trio and chorus "Pyongyang Where He Is" which was newly created by Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov, head of the orchestra, with profound reverence for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The concert presented by famous conductors, instrumentalists and singers including people's and merited artistes, international concours winners of the two countries was acclaimed by the audience for its high artistry and successful representation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il conveyed a floral basket to the performers, congratulating them on their successful presentation.
					
					 He met with leading members and principal artistes of the Russian orchestra including its head Pavel Ovsyannikov on the same day.
					
					 Noting that the Russian orchestra visited the DPRK several times and gave enthusiastic performances, carrying with them friendship towards the Korean people, and thus played a pioneer's role in boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, he appreciated the efforts made by the orchestra and extended warm greetings to all the creators and artistes of the orchestra.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Chun, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and other commanding officers of the army, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Il and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and leading officials of party and power bodies, armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in the city. Also among the audience were Valery E. Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and official diplomats of the Russian embassy here.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Rakwon Machine Complex Saturday to mark the 120th May Day.
					 Present there were Premier Kim Yong Il, Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol, Chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea Kim Pyong Phal, Minister of Machine-Building Industry Jo Pyong Ju, leading officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations in North Phyongan Province, officials concerned, persons of distinguished services, labor innovators and other working people.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said in his report that May Day is a significant holiday demonstrating before the world the revolutionary spirit of the Korean working people including workers, farmers and intellectuals devotedly working for the prosperity of the country, single-mindedly rallied around the Party, and showcasing their international solidarity and unity with the working people the world over struggling to break the chains of capital and gain democratic freedom and rights and independent life.
					
					 With deep insight into the position and role of the working masses including the working class in accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence, President Kim Il Sung awakened and organized broad masses, thereby building a strong driving force for the Korean revolution and dynamically advancing the revolution and construction with its might, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The President put forward the working people as the master of the country, society and revolution and led the revolution and construction to victory by dint of the creative ingenuity and concerted efforts of the working masses. The cause of the President is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In the days of the Songun revolutionary leadership Kim Jong Il made it sure that May Day was commemorated as the international holiday of the working people the world over from a Juche-based viewpoint and put up the slogan "Working People of the Whole World, Unite!," providing guidelines for reinforcing the mass foundation of the revolution in the new century.
					
					 The workers and other working people have devotedly worked for the country and the revolution under the wise leadership of the Party and the leader, thus making the stirring annals of the Korean revolution shine with undying exploits.  
					
					 The reporter called upon all the working people to advance like wind at the "Huichon speed" true to the idea and spirit enshrined in the joint New Year editorial, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea issued on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the WPK and the letter of the workers at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and thus work world-startling miracles and perform heroic feats in the on-going drive for a significant improvement in the people's standard of living.
					
					 He expressed positive support and firm solidarity with the south Korean working people in their just struggle for independence against the U.S. and for the democratization of society and national reunification.
					
					 The working people in the DPRK will discharge their historic mission in defending world peace and security and promoting the human cause of independence and boost international solidarity with the working people the world over under the uplifted banner of independence, peace and friendship, the reporter stressed.

articles.title: Officials Observe May Day
articles.content:
Officials Observe May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Senior Party and state officials significantly observed the 120th anniversary of May Day, the international holiday of the working people the world over, together with working people across the country.
					 Kim Yong Il, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and Chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, leading officials of the Cabinet, ministries, national institutions, local party and power organs and working people's organizations visited the Rakwon Machine Complex, the State Academy of Sciences, the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Migok Co-operative Farm in Sariwon City and other organs and industrial establishments and farms to congratulate the workers, agricultural workers and intellectuals on the holiday.
					
					 The senior Party and state officials laid bouquets before statues of President Kim Il Sung, portraits of smiling President and mosaic paintings with portraits of the peerlessly great persons. Going round museums of their revolutionary activities, rooms devoted to history of relevant units and other places, they were briefed on the shining path covered by them under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					They met innovators who have performed feats in the on-going great surge true to the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and gave a pep-talk to them.
					
					 They spent the holiday joining the working people in playing tug of war, Korean chess, Yut games and other colorful sports and amusement games and enjoying art performances.

articles.title: National Art Troupes Give Performances on May Day
articles.content:
National Art Troupes Give Performances on May Day
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by artistes of national art troupes at parks and pleasure grounds in Pyongyang on Saturday, May Day.
					 The artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance in front of the Nam Gate in Mt. Taesong.
					
					In such numbers as small chorus "May, Month of Victory", female solo "There Is No Man like the Leader", male solo "It's Really Good Society", small chorus "Push Back Frontier of the Latest Science" the performers sang high praises of the undying feats President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed by building the country where the people have become its masters, training the working people to be pillars of the revolution and creators of history and ushering in the new era of prosperity of the country with their indefatigable leadership.
					
					 The artistes of the State Folk Art Troupe gave a performance spiced with national flavor at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph, adding to the festive mood.
					
					  Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as male duet and chorus "May Day Song", mixed duet "We Are a Worker Couple", dance "Yangsando" and song and dance "Cuckoo".
					
					  Artistes of Pyongyang Circus presented physical acrobatics including "mixed etude", "turning of ring" and "rope jumping", and rapport magic and comedic magic at a park of the Mangyongdae Pleasure Ground, delighting people.

articles.title: May Day Observed
articles.content:
May Day Observed
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Saturday carry editorials on the occasion of the 120th May Day.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The Korean people extend warm militant greetings and firm solidarity to the working people and other revolutionary people the world over dynamically struggling for social progress and peace under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism. 
					
					 May Day is an international holiday demonstrating the militant might and revolutionary unity of the working people the world over struggling to put an end to all sorts of domination and subjugation and achieve independence.
					
					 The Korean people are now demonstrating the dignity as the most prestigious contingent of the world anti-imperialist independent forces for their intense fidelity to the popular masses' cause of independence and unshakable revolutionary principle and the great feats performed by them in the development of the socialist movement. 
					
					 The working people in the DPRK are now creditably discharging their honorable mission and duty in the sacred struggle to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu, the cause of socialism.
					
					 There are no such fighters in the world as the working people in the DPRK who feel proud and worthy of a true life in following their leader and devotedly defend their leader and implement his instructions by advancing like the wind, creating something out of nothing if desired by the Party. 
					
					 Waves of a high-pitched drive for a great revolutionary surge are sweeping all over the country and world-startling events are taking place day by day. This is the Korean working people's manifestation of patriotic enthusiasm.
					
					 The Korean working people live and struggle in the revolutionary soldier spirit, regarding it as their lifeline to bolster up the army of Songun which serves as a treasured sword for defending socialism.
					
					 They will as ever remain true to the ideology of the DPRK and Korean revolutionary mode and creative method and thus surely build a thriving nation of Juche on this land.
					
					 Minju Joson says that sky-high is the spirit of the Korean working people looking far into the eternally rosy future of the country on the orbit of certain rise and leap forward.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Participates in World Expo Opening Ceremony
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Participates in World Expo Opening Ceremony
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, participated in the opening ceremony of the 2010 Shanghai World Expo held in Shanghai on Friday.
					 Present at the opening ceremony were heads of state and government of foreign countries and representatives of international organizations and senior party and state officials of China.
					
					 Chinese President Hu Jintao declared the opening of the expo.
					
					 The participants appreciated a performance given by Chinese artistes and those of foreign countries and display of large lanterns, fountains and fireworks.
					
					 Prior to the opening ceremony, Kim Yong Nam was invited to the banquet given by Hu Jintao for foreign leaders.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Visits World Expo
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Visits World Expo
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, visited the 2010 Shanghai World Expo on Saturday.
					 Being briefed on the DPRK pavilion of the expo, it went round photos, exhibits, etc. showing the time-honored history and brilliant culture of the Korean nation, Pyongyang, which has turned in the era of Songun, and achievements made in building a thriving nation.
					
					 Then it went round the Chinese Pavilion.
					
					 During its stay in China the delegation visited a company.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, returned home Saturday by special plane after participating in the opening ceremony of the 2010 Shanghai World Expo held in China.
					 Returning home with him were members of the delegation, O Su Yong, vice-premier of the Cabinet, and Kim Song Gi, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.
					
					 It was greeted at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Kim Yong Ho, director of the Secretariat of the Cabinet, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Hao Xiaofei, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Chinese embassy here.

articles.title: Japanese Friendship Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Friendship Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A Japan-Korea friendship delegation of Osaka, Japan, led by Hirohachiro Kaku, co-representative of the Solidarity of Citizens in Osaka Prefecture Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK, arrived here on Saturday by air.

articles.title: Architectural Festival and Symposium to Be Held
articles.content:
Architectural Festival and Symposium to Be Held
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The 10th May 21 architectural festival and the 5th symposium on architectural beauty will be held here from May 4 to 7.
					 The festival will be divided into a city-planning and architectural design prize contest, a national symposium on architecture and construction, competition for the modernization of architectural designing, etc.
					
					 Valuable papers, architectural design programs and multi-media and others will be presented to the festival which will bring together creators and technicians in the fields of architecture and construction.

articles.title: Unity of Working People All over World Called for
articles.content:
Unity of Working People All over World Called for
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The working people all over the world are called upon to get united and wage a more dynamic struggle to build a true and new society where the working masses have become masters, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the holiday of the working people all over the world was instituted, but the desire of the working masses for independence and prosperity has not yet come true. 
					
					 The imperialists are working hard to benumb the independent thinking and consciousness of the popular masses and keep them as their permanent slaves.
					
					 In capitalist countries a large number of working people are denied even the elementary right to existence and their rights are ruthlessly violated.
					
					 The exploiting class in capitalist society is mercilessly trampling down upon the independent wishes of the popular masses and more harshly oppressing and exploiting them as it is exercising unlimited rights with all powers and means of production in its hands.
					
					 As long as the reactionary exploiting system and class are left intact, the popular masses can neither enjoy genuine freedom and happiness nor keep themselves alive. Only when the capitalist society, the exploiting system, is toppled down, can the working people the world over exercise their right as the independent human beings and play their role as the builder of the world.
					
					 A great many working people in the capitalist countries are struggling to win a genuine life as their rights are violated and they are deprived of independent rights. 
					
					 Since the day it emerged on the arena of history, the working class has always considered unity as a precious weapon in the struggle against international capital and won in the arduous struggles thanks to the unity. 
					
					 The unity serves as a powerful weapon in the hands of the working class. United we stand; divided, we fall.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked
Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The progressive people of the world significantly commemorated the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Floral baskets carrying the best wishes were sent to the DPRK's missions by heads of state, political parties, government ministries, organizations and institutions and high-ranking officials of different countries on these days.
					
					 Personages from all walks of life in various countries visited the DPRK embassies and laid floral baskets and bouquets before portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.
					
					 At least 350 commemoration events such as remembrance meetings praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great men, seminars on their feats and lectures took place in more than 80 countries including China, Cuba, India, Thailand, Japan, Germany, Italy, Denmark, France, Tanzania, South Africa, Uganda, Guinea, Peru and Mexico and regions and at international organizations.
					
					 Works of the peerlessly great men were published and released in Germany, Russia, Pakistan, Peru, Mexico and many other countries and more organizations for the study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, were formed in Switzerland, Italy and France.

articles.title: Birthday of KPA Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of KPA Marked
 Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Syria, a friendly gathering in Vietnam and film shows in Russia and the Czech Republic on April 21 and 22 on the occasion of the 78th birthday of the Korean People's Army.
					 Present at the events were officers of the general command of the armed forces, the defence ministry and the school of bereaved children of martyrs of Syria, the defence ministry and 308 mechanized infantry division of the People's Army of Vietnam, personages of the Russian Technical Glass Research Institute and the Gagarin branch of Moscow Bank of Russia and the Prague office of a company of the Czech Republic and masses. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien preside a la delegacion de la RPDC de visita en China para participar en la ceremonia inaugural de la Exposicion Mundial de Shanghai 2010, departio el dia 30 en esta ciudad con Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China.
					En la ocasion Hu Jintao senalo que la participacion de la delegacion de la RPDC en esa exposicion muestra que el partido y el gobierno de Corea conceden mucha importancia a la amistad con China y subrayo que en los ultimos anos, se logra un magnifico avance en las relaciones bilaterales gracias a los esfuerzos comunes de ambas partes.
					
					Apreciar mucho las relaciones de amistad China-Corea y desarrollar incesantemente las relaciones de buena vecindad es la invariable orientacion del partido y el gobierno chinos, indico y destaco que deben desarrollar de continuo el viaje reciproco de amistad y la cooperacion entre ambas partes y apoyarse y cooperar en la escena internacional.
					
					Se mostro contento de que bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por su Secretario General 
						Kim Jong Il el pueblo coreano haya logrado muchos exitos luchando con autoconfianza y tenacidad.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en la lucha por acelerar la construccion economica y mejorar la vida en este ano en que se celebrara el 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana el viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros O Su Yong, el vicecanciller Kim Song Gi y el embajador coreano en China Choe Pyong Gwan, y por la china, el miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Shanghai Yu Zhengsheng, el miembro del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina General Ling Jihua, el miembro del Secretariado del CC del PCCh y director de la Oficina Central de Investigacion Politica Wang Huning, el consejero de Estado Dai Bingguo, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores Yang Jiechi, el director de la Oficina del presidente Hu Jintao de la Oficina General Chen Shiju y el asistente del ministro de RR.EE. Wu Hailong.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se encuentra con Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se encuentra con Mahmoud Abbas
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, converso el dia 30 en Shanghai con Mahmoud Abbas, jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, quien esta participando en la Exposicion Mundial 2010.
					Kim transmitio a su interlocutor el saludo de parte del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Abbas expreso profundo agradecimiento al respecto y le encomendo a Kim que trasladara su sincero saludo al Dirigente.
					
					Diciendo que existen historicamente entre su pais y la RPDC magnificas relaciones de amistad, el mandatario palestino agrego que el pueblo palestino considera al pueblo coreano como su mas intimo amigo.
					
					Expreso la voluntad de seguir desarrollando los vinculos con Corea apuntando que ambos paises tienen el derecho a disfrutar de un futuro mas maravilloso.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el vicecanciller Kim Song Gi y otros funcionarios coreanos, el canciller Riad Al Malki, el ministro de Finanzas Hassan Abu Libdeh, el portavoz de la Oficina Presidencial Nabil Abu Rudaina, de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, y el embajador palestino en Corea.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana participa en la inauguracion de exposicion mundial
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana participa en la inauguracion de exposicion mundial
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, participo en el acto inaugural de la Exposicion Mundial de Shanghai 2010 que tuvo lugar la vispera en esta urbe china.
					En la inauguracion estuvieron presentes los jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises del mundo, los delegados de organizaciones internacionales y los cuadros del partido y el Estado de China.
					
					El presidente chino Hu Jintao declaro apertura de la exposicion.
					
					Los participantes presenciaron la funcion artistica preparada por los artistas chinos y de otros paises y la velada de grandes faroles, surtidores y fuegos artificiales.
					
					Con anterioridad, Kim Yong Nam fue invitado al banquete ofrecido por Hu Jintao en honor de los jefes de varios paises.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana recorre exposicion de Shanghai
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana recorre exposicion de Shanghai
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- La delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presidida por Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, visito el dia primero la Exposicion Mundial de Shanghai 2010.
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre el pabellon coreano, los miembros de la delegacion pasaron revista a las fotos y ponencias que daban a conocer la larga historia y la brillante cultura del pueblo coreano, el aspecto de la cambiada ciudad de Pyongyang, transformada excelentemente en la epoca del Songun, y los exitos logrados en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					A continuacion ellos visitaron el pabellon chino.
					
					Durante su estancia ahi, la delegacion visito una compania.

articles.title: Acto central por 120o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Acto central por 120o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon el acto central por el 120o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					A la ocasion asistieron el premier Kim Yong Il, el vicepremier Ro Tu Chol, el presidente del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea Kim Pyong Phal, el ministro de Industria Mecanica Jo Pyong Ju, los funcionarios directivos de las instituciones del partido y el Poder y organizaciones de masas, y otros funcionarios, benemeritos, innovadores laborales y trabajadores en la provincia de Pyong-an del Norte.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Il quien dijo en particular:
					
					El Primero de Mayo es la fiesta muy significativa para demostrar a todo el mundo el impetu revolucionario de los obreros, campesinos, intelectuales y otros trabajadores de Corea, que unidos compactamente en torno al partido, trabajan abnegadamente por la prosperidad de la patria, y para manifestar la solidaridad internacional y la unidad con los trabajadores de todo el mundo que luchan por romper las cadenas del capital y gozar de la libertad y el derecho democraticos y la vida independiente.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien al percatarse de la posicion y el papel de la clase obrera y las demas masas trabajadoras en el cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de las masas populares, concientizo y organizo amplias masas preparando asi el sujeto de la revolucion coreana e impulso energicamente la revolucion y la construccion apoyandose en el poderio de ellas.
					
					El Presidente hizo de los trabajadores duenos del pais, la sociedad y la revolucion y condujo a la victoria la revolucion y la construccion a base de la capacidad creadora y las fuerzas unidas de las masas populares trabajadoras.
					
					La causa del Presidente la lleva adelante hoy el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En los dias de su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Dirigente, partiendo de la posicion autoctona, hizo conmemorar el Primero de Mayo como fiesta internacional para los trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					
					Y presento la consigna "!Trabajadores del mundo entero, unios!" preparando la via para fortalecer la base masiva de la revolucion en el nuevo siglo.
					
					Bajo la sabia direccion del partido y el Lider, los obreros y otros trabajadores de Corea lucharon abnegadamente por la patria y la revolucion coronando con inmortales proezas los anales conmovedores de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Todos los trabajadores deben avanzar de viento en popa a la "velocidad de Huichon" en acato al editorial conjunto de este ano, las consignas conjuntas del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, publicadas con motivo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido, y a la idea y al espiritu de la carta de los obreros del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y tienen que crear los prodigios y proezas heroicas que asombren al mundo en la lucha de hoy por dar un gran auge en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida popular.
					
					Expreso el activo apoyo y firme solidaridad a la justa lucha de los trabajadores surcoreanos contra los imperialistas norteamericanos y por la independencia, la democratizacion de la sociedad y la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 Los trabajadores coreanos cumpliran con su mision historica en defender la paz y la seguridad del mundo y acelerar la causa de independencia de la humanidad y fortaleceran la solidaridad internacional con sus colegas de todo el mundo bajo la bandera de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.

articles.title: Periodicos felicitan la fiesta internacional de trabajadores
articles.content:
Periodicos felicitan la fiesta internacional de trabajadores
Pyongyang, 1 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron este sabado los editoriales dedicados al 120o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores del mundo entero.
					 El pueblo coreano envia el calido saludo combativo y firme solidaridad a los trabajadores y pueblos revolucionarios de todo el mundo que luchan con tenacidad por el progreso social y la paz bajo la bandera de independencia antiimperialista.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					 El Primero de Mayo deviene la fiesta internacional que manifiesta el poderio combativo y la solidaridad revolucionaria de los trabajadores del mundo que luchan por acabar con el dominio y subyugacion de toda indole y realizar la independencia.
					
					  El pueblo coreano es muy prestigioso entre las fuerzas independientes antiimperialistas del mundo por su infinita fidelidad a la causa de independencia de las masas populares, su firme principio revolucionario y sus grandes proezas acumuladas para el desarrollo del movimiento socialista.
					
					  Hoy, los trabajadores coreanos cumplen excelentemente con su honrosa mision y deber en la sagrada lucha por llevar a feliz termino la causa socialista y la revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					  En el mundo no hay otros combatientes como los trabajadores coreanos que, dispuestos a defender al lider y a materializar a costa de la vida las orientaciones del partido, buscan el verdadero valor de su vida en seguir a su dirigente y avanzan como torrente creando riquezas desde el cero si lo demanda el partido.
					
					  Ahora, en Corea se avivan furiosamente las llamas del gran auge revolucionario y se crean cada dia los prodigios que asombran al mundo, lo cual deviene la explosion del entusiasmo patriotico de los trabajadores coreanos, quienes toman como linea de vida el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas del Songun, medio omnipotente para la defensa del socialismo, y viven luchando con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					  Como lo hicieron en el pasado, en el futuro tambien ellos mantendran su propio ideal, modo revolucionario y metodo de creacion para levantar sin falta la gran potencia prospera del Juche en este territorio.
					
					  Minju Joson enfatiza que esta muy elevado el impetu de los trabajadores coreanos que se han ubicado firmemente en la orbita de ascenso y auge y estan muy seguros del maravilloso futuro de la patria.
